title: GET_RESOURCE_KVP_FLOAT
content:
0x35BDCEEA// GetResourceKvpFloat
float GET_RESOURCE_KVP_FLOAT(char* key);Parameters:key: The key to fetchReturns: The floating-point value stored under the specified key, or 0.0 if not found.A getter for SET_RESOURCE_KVP_FLOAT.Examples:Lualocal kvpValue = GetResourceKvpFloat('mollis')
if kvpValue ~= 0.0 then
	-- do something!
end
codeBlocks:
local kvpValue = GetResourceKvpFloat('mollis')
if kvpValue ~= 0.0 then
	-- do something!
end
